things.name: Dusty Entrance
things.description: You stand at the entrance to a dusty frontier town. A wooden sign creaks in the wind. There's a path leading north.

things.name: Main Street
things.description: The main street is quiet. Tumbleweed rolls past. The saloon is to the west, and you can go south back to the entrance.

things.name: Silver Dollar Saloon
things.description: The saloon is dimly lit. A piano sits silent in the corner. The exit is to the east.

things.name: Wooden Sign
things.description: Welcome to Dusty Creek - Population: Dwindling
